data.title: Forenom Serviced Appartments Drammen
data.meta_description:
Forenom Serviced Apartments in Drammen, located in Strømsø, offer convenient access to nearby cafes, restaurants, and shops. 
Our apartments range from cosy studios for two to spacious three-bedroom units for five people, spanning the first to the fifth floor. Enjoy hassle-free check-in with key code access. Parking is available for rent in a nearby garage, and you can easily reach E134 towards Kongsberg or E18 towards Oslo or Kristiansand with just a short drive. Plus, public transport is incredibly accessible, as the train station and bus terminal are just a minute's walk away.
data.text: Forenom Serviced Apartments Drammen is located in Strømsø, in immediate proximity to a wide range of cafées, restaurants and shops in the neighbourhood or by crossing the bridge to Bragernes. The river Drammenselva is just a few minutes from the apartment building; you can go for a stroll or run along the river. Head up towards the river, and you will find Union Brygge with the y-shaped bridge Ypsilon or continue further up towards Gulskogen gård with a great park area where peafowls will walk freely around in summer. The apartments range from Studios for two to larger three-bedroom apartments for five, located from the first to the fifth floor. Key code access allows for easy check-in and access at any time. Parking is available for hire in a parking garage nearby; access to E134 towards Kongsberg or E18 towards Oslo or Kristiansand is within a few minutes drive—easy access to public transport, with the train station and bus terminal within a minute's walk.
